articles.title: Operation Sindoor: India to maintain escalation dominance, de-escalation rests on Pakistan - Firstpost
articles.description: Under Operation Sindoor that is now in its third day, India will keep the escalation dominance and maintain that de-escalation rests on Pakistan. India will ensure that the cost imposed on Pakistan will be greater than whatever cost Pakistan would try to impo…
articles.content:
Under Operation Sindoor that is now in its third day, India will keep the escalation dominance and maintain that de-escalation rests on Pakistan.
